text: Alejo Jose Velez Cucalon (born May 1, 1968 in Zaragoza) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and a T12/B2 type athlete. He competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He finished second in the high jump. == References == Category:Living people Category:1968 births Category:Spanish long jumpers Category:High jumpers Category:Spanish triple jumpers Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2 Category:People from Zaragoza
